Detailed Description

Type of attribut for a version

This type allows to code attribut for a global data on an 32 bits unsigned integer. The following bits are reserved:

  • _attr & 0x1 == 1 iff the global data is in a stack, else it is in heap
  • _attr & 0x2 == 1 iff the data is sticky and could not be moved, neither destroyed or copied.
